Comment.MultiLanguageText: Unique data area for this counter

AttributeList.Text: GEN: Transfer Inputs to local data
TIMER: Calculate seconds based on h, m, s (max)
TIMER: Calculate seconds based on h, m, s (step)
TIMER: Decide if max timer is used
TIMER: Convert remaining to h, m, s (max)
TIMER: Convert remaining to h, m, s (step)
